entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
